features: Hair regrowth tip - one of the easiest ways to avoid hair loss is to ditch that artificial hair growth shampoo with damaging sulfates and choose a biotin shampoo with gentler more natural ingredients

Shampoo for thinning hair care - say hello to better volume with our moisturizing hair thinning shampoo made with rosemary and biotin hair vitamins for the appearance of thicker fuller and softer hair
Biotin for men and women - go the extra mile for hair care with our volume shampoo brimming with B complex vitamins plus essential oils for hair in our ultimate extra strength hair enhancing formula
Dry scalp care shampoo - enrich your scalp for gorgeous-looking locks with our biotin zinc shampoo for dry scalp for a visibly less flaky scalp thanks to ultra hydrating and nourishing jojoba oil
Premium quality - extra strength biotin shampoo can help transform the way your hair looks thanks to a rich panel of natural ingredients and essential oils that cleanse and nourish from root to tip

Biotin Conditioner & Extra Strength Biotin Shampoo High-quality care for your scalp, roots and hair strands with our biotin shampoo & conditioner. GET BOTH Leave-In Conditioner and Biotin Shampoo Combat frizz, damage, dullness and dryness with our special biotin shampoo and leave-in conditioner GET BOTH Boost Hair Oil and Extra Strength Biotin Shampoo Allow our unique hair oil formula to pamper your locks, alongside your ordinary hair care routine GET BOTH Boost Hair Serum and Extra Strength Biotin Shampoo Discover next-level hair wellness and care with our cleansing shampoo and conditioning hair serum GET BOTH Biotin Supplement & Extra Strength Biotin Shampoo With our biotin supplement and extra strength shampoo, you can see fuller and thicker hair fast GROW HAIR

What does this shampoo smell like? Our Extra Strength Biotin Shampoo has a mind scent of earthy sandalwood Is this shampoo good for cleansing follicles? Yes, it is! Our shampoo is designed to remove buildup and impurities from the surface of the scalp, and to make your roots and follicles happy and hydrated! Is this shampoo anti-dandruff? This shampoo is not designed to cure or prevent any medical condition, but it will work hard to remove flakes, dirt, excess oils and various impurities from your scalp and roots. I have fine dry hair. Is this shampoo for me? Yes! This shampoo is recommended for those with dry scalp and/or thin, fine hair. It is suitable for all hair types, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using for years…makes thin hair feel full and gives it volume…very happy with this Biotin Shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I could not wait to write this review. My hair has been thinning lately, when I took a shower there would be so much hair in the drain, and I have been watching thinning spots by either side or my bangs, where my hairline was actually receding. I was not liking it. So I went to amazon to search for a product/shampoo that would promote new hair growth and stop losing my hair. I wasn't really expecting much to be honest. I came across this Biotin shampoo and I read all the reviews. People actually saying that after a few uses they could see new hair sprouting. And there were even some pictures that looked pretty encouraging. But still, I just couldn't imagine that a cure for this horrific problem could be so easy. So I ordered it 2 weeks ago. I washed my hair immediately the day I got it in the mail. And the first thing that floored me there was NO hair in my hair catcher in my drain after I washed my hair. I laughed out loud. It has now been less than 2 weeks, I've used it like 3 or 4 times, and I have NEW HAIR SPROUTING like new grass in my thinning spots. I swear to you I do. On both sides of my hairline, AND filling in my hairline in my bangs. I don't even know what else to say but that this stuff is a miracle. Nothing less. And there is either none, or close to no hair loss when I wash my hair. It's almost ridiculous. I just ordered a biotin leave in serum to keep the ball rolling, but I will tell you, anyone who is on the fence as to whether they should try this shampoo, should! I'm almost laughing. I have baby little blonde hairs sprouting up this fast. And my hair, how it feels and smells, it's unbelievably fabulous. And this stuff costs way less than those fancy shampoos. If I didn’t see this with my own eyes, I would not believe it. What people are saying here is true, I am so glad I didn't just say it sounded too good to be true and blow it off. Thinning hair is awful, whether you are a man or a woman. All I know is my brother spent tons for his hair plugs, and he needs them again. I don't know if every single person is getting these results, but I am , I think you should try it and see. I will NEVER stop using this shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started losing my hair and was devastated. So I looked up a bunch of products and was using “hair restore” but it got discontinued. So I reluctantly bought this shampoo, worried it wasn’t going to work as well as my last purchase, but instead I now see I am losing almost NO hair in the shower and only about 50 a day. Before I was at least losing 150+ a day and this shampoo made it nearly stop. So I would say it’s definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewerName: Melody of the mindMelody of the mind
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Oh, to speak of this shampoo divine,That makes hair soft and oh so fine,A potion of biotin and oils so pure,That grants a mane both rich and sure.Thou shall not find a better brew,To nourish locks and make them new,Forsooth, tis like magic at play,And hair shall shine as bright as day.The scent of herbs and flowers sweet,Does make the head feel light on its feet,And with each wash, thee shalt feel,How soft and smooth thy tresses appear.No more shall thy hair be dry and frail,For biotin shampoo shall set thee sail,On waves of beauty and boundless glee,To a shore where luscious locks run free.Oh, how this shampoo doth impress,A remedy for hair in great distress,That mends and heals with every use,And leaves the mane all supple and loose.In every bottle lies a treasure rare,Of biotin, the vitamin so fair,That fortifies each strand with might,And gives the hair a lustrous sight.So, hearken me, oh wise and fair,And take this shampoo without a care,Forsooth, thy hair shall thank thee much,And all heads shall turn with every touch.In sum, this shampoo is a boon,A gentler wash that sings a tune,Of beauty and grace, and hair so fine,That all shall say it is simply divine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo works very well. It has a nice lather and a great smell too! I haven’t been using it very long but my hair does feel thicker and fuller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: I love the original version of this shampoo, so I thought this one would be extra good. Unfortunately, it weighs down my fine long hair. It would probably work great for folks with medium to thick hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality shampoo. Cleans well. Good feel to head. Not too harsh on hair. A lot for your money. Nice packaging. Reasonable price for product. Delivered quickly. Would buy again.
Great been using it a while and is a good shampoo for strong hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 5, 2023

reviews.reviewerName: This product is useless, even with all the prescriptions i gotta bad result. My hair fall start again due the use of this product. I will not recommend this.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is useless, due to the use of this shampoo, my hair fall starts again. All the descriptions and prescriptions are on the shampoo but the result is zero. I will not recommend this to anyone.
